Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Macarius the Great:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/: n~te w~ pao#c# n~iwt abba Makari: nem nefs/ri n~c~taurovoroc: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Through the prayers, of my master and father Abba Macarius, and all his children the cross-bearers, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
